comments:
I'm using Eclipse 3.0 RC1 (eclipse-SDK-3.0RC1-win32.zip) and CDT 2.0 M8
(org.eclipse.cdt-2.0M8-win32.win32.x86.zip). When I try to create a new C++
project using File/New/Project... there is no sign of any C++ components.

If I select File/New/Other... a C++ folder with a Class wizard is available.

I have the same problem using Eclipse 3.0 M8 and M9.

In the Eclipse 3.0 RC1 log the following error occurs, even if I just start and
stop Eclipse:
